subject: Football
Cheerleaders
Wages and Salaries
Workplace Hazards and Violations
lead_paragraph: For years, cheerleaders labored off the radar of enforcers of wage and hour laws. In the world beyond the castle that is the N.F.L., this is known as wage theft. But the cultural dial is turning.
snippet: For years, cheerleaders labored off the radar of enforcers of wage and hour laws. In the world beyond the castle that is the N.F.L., this is known as wage theft. But the cultural dial is turning.
